name: University of Lapland
overview: The University of Lapland blends Arctic expertise with disciplines such as art and design, education, law, social sciences, and tourism research. It offers high-quality education supported by modern study facilities. With strategic priorities like responsible tourism and service design, the university fosters innovative interdisciplinary collaboration.
